channel.title: word embedding on My Favorite
channel.description: Recent content in word embedding on My Favorite

item.title: An Introduction of Word2Vec and implementation using Tensorflow
item.description: Word2Vec is not a singular algorithm, rather, it is a family of model architectures and optimizations that can be used to learn word embeddings from large datasets. Embeddings learned through Word2Vec have proven to be successful on a variety of downstream natural language processing tasks.
